net.joala.image.impl
Class DefaultByteArrayImageBuilder

java.lang.Object
  net.joala.image.impl.DefaultByteArrayImageBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ByteArrayImageBuilder, ImageBuilder<byte[]>, ImageIOImageBuilder<byte[]>
@Named
public class DefaultByteArrayImageBuilder
extends Object
implements ByteArrayImageBuilder

Creates an image as byte array.

Since:
2013-02-19

getImageBuilderConfig

@Nonnull
protected final ImageBuilderConfig getImageBuilderConfig()

Retrieve object for default configuration for image builders. If not used within Spring context a singleton instance of ImageBuilderConfigImpl will be used.

Returns:
config object for default settings
